name: daily-diet-api
description: - [ ] Should be able to create a user - [ ] Should be able to identify a user between requests - [ ] Should be able to register a meal with fields name, description, time, is diet or not - [ ] Should be able to edit a meal - [ ] Should be able to delete a diet - [ ] Should be able to list all diets - [ ] Should be able to view a specific meal - [ ] Should be able to get user metrics     - [ ] Amount of meals     - [ ] Amount of meals in the diet     - [ ] Amount of meals out of the diet     - [ ] Best sequence of meals in the diet - [ ] Only the owner of the meal can view, edit or delete the meals
